jwt_handler module¶

jwt_handler.decode_jwt(token)¶

decode jwt

Args:

user (token): user token

Returns:

dict: user data store in the token

jwt_handler.encode_jwt(user)¶

Encode jwt

Args:

user (dict): user data

Returns:

token: jwt token of the user
